comment: * Provides utilities to interact with the device's {@link Settings}.

methods.name: public static void set(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key, @Nullable String value)
methods.comment: * Uses a Shell command to "asynchronously" set the given preference, returning right away.

methods.name: public static void syncSet(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key, @Nullable String value)
methods.comment:
* Uses a Shell command to "synchronously" set the given preference by registering a listener
     * and wait until it's set.

methods.name: public static void delete(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key)
methods.comment: * Uses a Shell command to "asynchronously" delete the given preference, returning right away.

methods.name: public static void syncDelete(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key)
methods.comment:
* Uses a Shell command to "synchronously" delete the given preference by registering a listener
     * and wait until it's called.

methods.name: public static String get(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key)
methods.comment: * Gets the value of a given preference using Shell command.

methods.name: private static void assertNewValue(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key, @Nullable String expectedValue)

methodNames: public static void set(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key, @Nullable String value)
public static void syncSet(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key, @Nullable String value)
public static void delete(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key)
public static void syncDelete(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key)
public static String get(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key)
private static void assertNewValue(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull String key, @Nullable String expectedValue)
